item.title: Cleaning not completed properly of cherry trees, 15th August
item.description:
Made complaint re cherry trees (FixMyStreet ref: 7999644.) . Requested for trees to be removed/pruned thoroughly. Instead was advised that cleaning services would tend to the mess on pavement. Cleaning services came today - see above photos AFTER they had been and my report was classed as Fixed and closed. The mess from the trees have not been cleaned and the pavement is still a hazard to pedestrians and residents attracting flies and wasps. Please can the detritus be actually cleaned off the pavement and road and can these trees be tended to more frequently by the council going forward?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haywood Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter in the park, 15th August
item.description:
Tanner street Park bins are overflowing from food and drink packaging . In particular : the Franco Manca pizza boxes are blocking the bins. This is exacerbated over the weekend when the sun is out.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatchers Mews, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over flowing commercial bins, 15th August
item.description:
Hackney Council have moved the bins from outside the shops into the green space which has now been ruined by the constant littering and fly tipping. So what was a nice green space for the public has been turned into a rubbish tip!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This bollard light flashes on and off at night out of control., 15th August
item.description:
This bollard light flashes on and off at 1-2 second intervals all night. Its very bright and we cannot sleep. Last night was the second night we have had the problem (started on 14th).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Doveney Close, St Paul's Cray, London

item.title: Damage to my car tires, 15th August
item.description:
Pothole caused damage to 2 of my car tires on Monday 11th August 2025, I couldn’t take pictures on the day of the incident but when I return to the since on Friday 15ht August the potholes have been repaired. It has costed me £202.94 for 2 tires without installation, which require back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East Cross Route, Hackney Wick, London
Report on FixMyStreet
